DataElement.preferredName: Lymphedema Symptom Intensity and Distress Survey-Arm V 2.0 During Past Week Have Lost Interest in Sex Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of whether or not they lost interest in sex during the past week, using a yes, no or prefer not to answer response.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Lymphedema Symptom Intensity and Distress Survey-Arm During Past Week Have Lost Interest in Sex

ReferenceDocuments.name: Lymphedema Symptom Intensity and Distress Survey-Arm Version 2.0
Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. In cases where retaining the question set intact to preserve the validity and reliability are not as important as advancing the science, questions may be used individually or in combination with other measure questions.

DataElement.origin: LSIDS-A:Lymphedema Symptom and Intensity Survey-Arm; SH Ridner et al., Support Care Cancer (2015)
